verses.verse: Save <S%H3467><s%> me <S%H430><s%>, O God, by your name <S%H8034><s%>, and judge <S%H1777><s%> me by your strength <S%H1369><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>; give ear <S%H238><s%> to the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

For strangers <S%H2114><s%> are risen up <S%H6965><s%> against me <S%H6184><s%>, and oppressors seek <S%H1245><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%>: they have not set <S%H7760><s%> God <S%H430><s%> before them <S%H5542><s%>. Selah.
Behold <S%H430><s%>, God is my helper <S%H5826><s%>: the Lord <S%H136><s%> is with them that uphold <S%H5564><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
He shall reward <S%H7725><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> unto my enemies <S%H8324><s%>: cut them off <S%H6789><s%> in your truth <S%H571><s%>.
I will freely <S%H5071><s%> sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> unto you <S%H3034><s%>: I will praise your name <S%H8034><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>; for it is good <S%H2896><s%>.
For he has delivered <S%H5337><s%> me out of all trouble <S%H6869><s%>: and my eye <S%H5869><s%> has seen <S%H7200><s%> his desire upon my enemies <S%H341><s%>.
